name: Am I in a game?
description:
Show the turtle that he's just a character in a random video game.


Think outside the box. Play outside the game.

The game is short... if you know what to do.

There is also 1 optional cutscene that you can unlock.

Solved it? Want an additional challenge?

Try out the newly released mobile version with some major differences, available on Google Play!

The way to solve the second-half of the mobile version completely differs from this version.

Clues?

  • (First part of the game) If you keep walking and moving to different rooms many times without solving the game, there will be a clue!
  • (After the turtle asked you to show him something else) Accidentally shown him the thing he wanted to see but you don’t know what happened or what you did? The turtle will say what he saw, that should help you.
  • (After the turtle asked you to show him something else) Can’t solve this part and don’t want to figure it out on your own anymore? More clues will show up as you keep walking and moving to different rooms without solving the game. The very last clue should really help.

Note

The web browser version may not play dialogue sound effects properly.
